title.narrative: 2018 Mgmt Project - Bridging the Technology Gap Towards Ghana Beyond Aid and Youth Employment

description.narrative: • Host a national conference to bring together experienced Ghanaian practitioners in the fields of STEI (Science, Technology, Engineering and Innovation) across the world to share experiences on how to best map a sustainable path for bridging the gap. • Capture key conference take-aways and policy recommendations through development of a Summary Conference Report. • Disseminate developed content through publication of report and post-conference media engagement, including TV, radio and social media.
